channel.title: Please read!
channel.description:
can someone make a server and set my player rights to 3 to make me owner cause i cant make a server cause every source used on my computer has a problem with java like i click on runserver and it says...
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Please click any button to continue...

item.title: Please read!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

ok =][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 06:24:10 pm[/size][hr]it still says…

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or bath file.
Press any key to continue…

Read full topic

item.title: Please read!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

change your runserver.bat to

@echo off
java -cp . server
pause

Read full topic
